item.title: Module 1 Our Present Enshittified Moment
item.description: Enshittification, or, Why Does The Web Suck Right Now? This module will look at the web as it is in September 2025. The web is not a synonym for the internet! But it’s the layer that you encounter most often, and it’s changing rapidly. We’ll work backwards from this current moment of change and destruction (the deployment of AI into search and writing), back to the era of user generated ‘content’ and why ‘content’ is a rhetorical move that diminishes human creativity, past the dot-com boom to the first bloom of the web in the 1990s.
